title: FFPlayer: prebuit: Update to use the version suffix stripped ffmpeg libraries

title: FFPlayer: native library: Update the ffmpeg libraries to 2.0 release
message:
FFPlayer: native library: Update the ffmpeg libraries to 2.0 release

Note: __memcpy_chk runtime linkage error existed on my XT910
It seems that the libc.so on XT910 doesn't use __memcpy_chk,
but the libavutil.so compiled in AOSP Jellybean environment,
the libc.so use __memcpy_chk

title: FFPlayer: Initial feature bringup
message:
FFPlayer: Initial feature bringup

- remove un-needed code, refine some classes
- enable playing a target local system video stream
- fix Java thread exit in native code without detach current thread from JavaVM

Known issues:
1. Can't support media stream location contains spaces
2. Media control isn't implemented yet
